name: Satgana
description:
Satgana is an early-stage Climate Tech Venture Capital firm on a mission to invest in the next generation of planet-positive startups. 
We are global collective, passionate about taking climate action. Our diverse team of professionals cover a large spectrum of backgrounds, functions, sectors and countries across Europe and emerging markets.

This is the decade to build the world we want. 🌱
Join the journey at satgana.com
slogan: Climate Tech Venture Capital firm investing in the next generation of entrepreneurs building the Future of Earth
